description.1: Use of a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Angular, Proxmox and WordPress.
description.2: I worked with a team of developers to create a series of web applications to facilitate the monitoring and evaluation of scientific publications at the Cuban national level.

description.1: Developed and maintained code for in-house and client websites primarily using JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, and CSS.
description.2: I worked on different types of national and international projects such as: e-commerce and project management systems.
